implemented.summary: Fixed DoS vulnerability in LiveSocket where unlimited payload size could lead to OOM attacks.
implemented.evidence: Verified with reproduction test case in py_rme_canary/tests/unit/core/protocols/test_live_socket_security.py

implemented.summary: Fixed regression in ItemTypeDetector where door lookups were failing due to missing definitions.
implemented.evidence: Verified with existing unit tests in py_rme_canary/tests/unit/logic_layer/test_item_type_detector.py

implemented.summary: Fixed timing attack vulnerability in LiveServer password comparison using secrets.compare_digest.
Verified usage of defusedxml for safe XML parsing to prevent XXE attacks.
implemented.evidence: Code review confirmed imports from core.io.xml.safe

implemented.summary: Verified ScriptEngine sandbox implementation blocking dangerous AST nodes.
implemented.evidence: Code review confirmed AST visitor blocks eval, exec, open, and dangerous attributes

implemented.summary: Fixed authentication bypass vulnerability where unauthenticated clients could send messages and updates.
implemented.evidence: Verified with reproduction test case in py_rme_canary/tests/unit/core/protocols/test_live_server_auth_bypass.py

implemented.summary: Implemented Rate Limiting for LiveServer to prevent DoS attacks.
implemented.evidence: Verified with py_rme_canary/tests/unit/core/protocols/test_live_server_dos.py. Implemented 50 packets/second limit per client.

suggested_next.summary: Implement TLS encryption for LiveServer connections.
suggested_next.rationale: Passwords and map data are currently transmitted in plain text. TLS is required to prevent eavesdropping and MITM attacks.
